title.rendered: Note to Physicians, Pharmacists and Architects:

acf.intro_title: Note to Physicians, Pharmacists and Architects:
acf.intro_text:
Principal applicants intending to apply as a Physician/Specialist Physician (NOC 3111 or 3112) must be assessed by the Medical Council of Canada (MCC).

Individuals intending to apply as a Pharmacist (NOC 3131) must have an assessment from the Pharmacy Examining Board of Canada (PEBC).

Individuals intending to apply as an Architect (code 21200) must have an assessment from the Canadian Architectural Certification Board (CACB).

For more information on physicians, pharmacists, and architects, please visit Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada.
